title: Giro d’Italia Stage 7: Ayuso Rockets to Mountaintop Win in GC Showdown, Roglič Gapped but Gains Pink Jersey
content:
Pedersen out of pink after bruising multi-mountain stage, Roglič holds slim GC advantage over UAE Emirates duo Ayuso and Del Toro in Giro's first classification shake up.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Stage 7: Ayuso Rockets to Mountaintop Win in GC Showdown, Roglič Gapped but Gains Pink Jersey on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
